53899.「ふむ……。残念だが そなたは\n その装備品の 見た目となれる装備を\n 持っ:
Hmm... I'm afraid you don't have any equipment
that could be used to dress up what you chose.

53900.「ドレスアップしたいのだな？\n ならば 今装備しているものの中から\n ドレス:
So, you'd like to do some dressing up? Please choose what you'd like to dress up from what you currently have equipped.
You can dress up face accessories, but other accessories and crafting tools cannot be.

53901.「では ドレスアップした装備品を\n 元の姿に戻そう。\n 見た目に使った装備は:
You want to restore this equipment to its original appearance? You won't get back the item you used to change it.
The equipment will also lose any custom coloring. So, you want me to change it back?

53902.「やめるのだな？ それも よかろう。: You want to stop? That's fine.

53903.「よし……。解除成功だ。\n 装備を 元の見た目に戻したぞ。:
Okay... I've successfully restored your
equipment to its original appearance!

<select_se_off>
Dress Up
Undo Dress Up

<select_end><close>

53905.「ここは 魔法のドレスアップ屋。\n 魔法仕立て術により 装備品の性能はそのまま:
This is my Magic Dress Up Shop. I can change the appearance of your equipment without changing its performance!
I'm glad you came, my friend. How can I help you today?

53907.「むむむ……？\n そこには 何も装備してないではないか。:
Hmmm...? You don't have anything equipped at
the moment...

53909.「ドレスアップとは 魔法仕立て術により\n 装備品の性能はそのまま 見た目だけを:
A dress-up is a miraculous feat of magical tailoring that transforms one piece of equipment into another without sacrificing
its performance. First, you choose a piece of equipment that will perform, then you choose a piece of equipment that will look... The
equipment used for the look is level- and profession-neutral. The equipment you use to look good will disappear when you dress up.
And they don't come back when you undress them, so remember... Once you've dressed up a piece of gear, you can't use it as a look
again. And you can keep using the same look over and over again. Of course, you have to pay to dress up your gear. But if you want to
un-dress and revert to your original look, it's free.

53910.「<%sM_item2><%sM_plusnum2>を性能として\n 他の見た目:
You want to apply a dress up on your
<%sM_item2><%sM_plusnum2>? If so, please
choose the appearance you'd like to use.

53911.「よかろう！\n では 我が魔法の仕立て術の神秘！\n その目で とくと見るがよ:
Very well! Now, the mysteries of my magical
art of tailoring! Behold!!

53912.「<%sM_item2><%sM_plusnum2>を\n <%sM_item>:
If you dress up <%sM_item2><%sM_plusnum2> using the <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>, this is what it'll look like.
The cost will be <%dM_gold> Gold. Is that all right?

53913.「その装備は ドレスアップには使えぬのだ。\n 魔法仕立て術も 万能ではないと知:
That equipment can't be used to dress up, it
seems... My magic tailoring does have its
limits, you know.

53914.「むむっ？ <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は\n 仲間モンスター:
Hmm? That <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> is

<yesno 2><close>
